TopicTitle: What the heck is going on with Jool? Is this a bug? (Pics)

Articles.Content:
So, this. I went to poke around at Jool- I wanted to see what would happen when I sunk a probe into it.

But this happened.

What was the black line in the last pic- an error?

Is the teeny ball in the third Jool's core? or a glitch?

What is with the crazy distortion of the first two pictures?

Edited August 1, 2013 by Tassyr
Link error

Ehh... pics don't show up for me

EDIT: Now they do.

Edited August 1, 2013 by astropapi1
Jool is not the happiest place in the game, it's quite uh, laggy. And just weird. So a lot of weird stuff happens there for no reason.

I sunk a probe into Jool once. It fell through the floor, and continued orbiting around what I assumed to be it's center of gravity. It then exploded several times over, with my probe body conveniently being the last piece so I could retain a modicum of control.
Ahhhh. Well, at least I know I don't have to worry about firing another probe into it to see if it was a mistake. Darn. I was hoping to get to the core possibly. xD
now how do I put this to 'closed,' as it's clear people know this is happening? XD

I thought the same thing when I sent my probe...

Rocas finally did something useful...

I thought the same thing when I sent my probe...

Rocas finally did something useful...

He looks like he's underwater!

now how do I put this to 'closed,' as it's clear people know this is happening? XD

I believe that you can do that by editing the OP.

Also, don't double post.

Well the atmo is fairly thick in Jool at that point, or should be anyway.

At that point in his fall I got bored of waiting to see if his command pod would explode so took him eva. He ended up doing the funky chicken about 3 minutes later.

He looks like he's underwater!

Not quite water, but some sort of liquid, wouldn't be surprised. /

Rocas looks quite pleased with himself!

He should be. Every mission he was on he has broken something in one way or another usually leaving him stranded.

This time he has a mission where he won't get yelled at for breaking things because it was his mission to break stuff, preferably himself...
I look at Jool at a big ball of soup that gets thicker as you descend. Eventually the pressure and buoyancy are so high that you end up just being part of the soup.
